sen.e: He was born as the second son of Toshiaki OTOMO, the 20th head of the Otomo clan of Bungo Province.

sen.j: 天文12年（1544年）、実子の無い叔父の大内義隆の猶子として迎えられ、室町幕府第12代将軍・足利義晴から一字をもらって晴英と名乗る。
sen.e: In 1544 he was adopted by his uncle Yoshitaka OUCHI, who had no son of his own, and he was named Haruhide, receiving one Chinese character from the name of the 12th Shogun of the Muromachi Shogunate Yoshiharu ASHIKAGA.

sen.j: しかし天文14年（1545年）、義隆に実子の大内義尊が誕生したため、猶子関係を解消され、帰国した。
sen.e: However, in 1545, his adoption was cancelled and he returned to his country, because Yoshitaka had become the father of his own son, Yoshitaka OUCHI.

sen.j: しかし義隆の重臣陶隆房（陶晴賢）が義隆に対して謀反を企てると、隆房は天文20年（1551年）5月に晴英を大内氏の新当主に迎えることを示した。
sen.e: However, when the chief vassal Takafusa SUE plotted treachery against Yoshitaka, he stated that he would welcome Haruhide as the new head of the OUCHI clan.

However, when the chief vassal Takafusa SUE (Harukata SUE) plotted treachery against Yoshitaka, he stated that he would welcome Haruhide as the new head of the OUCHI clan in May 1551.

sen.j: 大友義鎮は当初から陶隆房が晴英を傀儡として擁立するだけで、自分の政権が揺ぎ無いものとなれば、廃嫡されるに違いないと疑い反対したが、晴英自身が大内当主となるのを望み、「この要請を断り中傷を受ける事の方が悔しいので、命は惜しくない」と主張した為、義鎮もこれを認めた。
sen.e: Yoshishige OTOMO from the beginning was opposed, as he had the suspicion that if only Takafusa SUE supported Haruhide as his puppet and his own government would shake and disappear, he would likely be disinherited, but as Haruhide himself wanted to become the head of the OUCHI clan and claimed that "it is more regretful for me to be slandered by rejecting this request, I don't care for my life", and therefore Yoshishige accepted.

sen.j: そして9月に謀反を起こして義隆が殺される（大寧寺の変）と、大内氏の新当主として擁立される（このとき、隆房は晴英を君主として敬うことを内外に表明するため、晴英から一字を拝領し、晴賢と改名した）。
sen.e: In September they execute their plot and Yoshitakai is killed (Taineiji no hen, the revolt of Taineiji), and Haruhide is put forward as the new head of the Ouchi clan (at that point, Takafusa received one character from Haruhide's name and took on the new name Harukata, in order to show everybody that he was respecting Haruhide as the new overlord).

sen.j: 天文22年（1553年）、室町幕府13代将軍の足利義藤から一字をもらって大内義長と改名した。
sen.e: In 1553 he received one character from the name of the 13th shogun of the Muromachi Shogunate Yoshifuji ASHIKAGA and took on the new name Yoshinaga.

sen.j: また、弘治2年（1556年）には、勘合貿易の再開を求めて明に使者を派遣したが、明からは正統な大内氏当主としての承認を拒まれている。
sen.e: In 1556 he called for the reopening of the the tally trade (between Japan and the Ming dynasty) and sent envoys to the Ming dynasty, but the Ming Dynasty refused to accept him as the rightful head of the Ouchi clan.

sen.j: 弘治元年（1555年）、陶晴賢が毛利元就との厳島合戦で敗死すると、血縁があるとはいえ一度解消された経緯のある養子だった義長の求心力は低く、ただでさえ陶晴賢の謀反やその他の内訌で弱体化していた家臣団は完全に崩壊し、大内氏は急速に衰退していく。
sen.e: When in 1555, Harukata SUE dies in the Itsukushima War with Motonari MORI, as the attractiveness of Yoshinaga was low, because although he was related by blood, he had been an adoptive son whose adoption had been cancelled once, and the vassals were collapsing because they had been weakened by Harukata's SUE's plot and internal strife, the Ouchi clan rapidly dissolves.

sen.j: 義長は寡兵で良く防戦したが、結局は高嶺城を放棄して重臣内藤隆世の長門且山城へ敗走する。
sen.e: Yoshinaga defended well with merecenaries, but in the end he gave up Konomine-jo Castle and flees to the Nagato Katsuyama-jo Castle of his chief vassal Takayo NAITO.

sen.j: 誘ふとて 何か恨みん 時きては 嵐のほかに 花もこそ散れ
sen.e: "Even if I die like this, I do not have anything to regret, even if no storm blows, when the time comes, the blossoms fall."

sen.j: 義長の死により、西国の名門・大内氏は滅亡したが、早くから分かれた傍流の山口氏が江戸時代まで存続した。
sen.e: Due to the death of Yoshinaga the famous clan of the western provinces, the Ouchi clan, collapsed, but the branch of the Yamaguchi clan, which had separated at an early time, continued to exist until the Edo period.
